website_summaries.verdict: Other engravers at this price point only include a few carbide steel bits, but this model includes seven diamond bits right out of the box. Great value.
pros: Includes seven diamond tipped engraving points and a special grinding tool
Can be held like a standard writing pen
cons: May not arrive with all additional accessories
Power button must be held down, so there is no continuous operation

customer_reviews.title: Almost as Easy as Writing
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly! As suggested by the other reviews, I practiced on the back of campaign buttons. I had every confidence that I could achieve a good result after only three tries. I went from manuscript print to script for the engraving of 30 wedding bell favors (there was a small bordered area around the middle of the bell that was perfect for the inscription). If you can write, or print with a slow, steady hand, then you can use this engraver pen.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to engrave some stainless steel keychains I bought as gifts for my son's teachers. Works great and is easy to use. I would recommend practicing on something you don't care about first so you can get a feel for it because it does spin so it tries to move in the direction it is spinning. The keychains turned out great and I am sure it will get a lot more use! I've also tested it out on glass and it worked great on that too!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie._.Messie

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: Great tool to have around. Only down side (kinda), wish you didn't have to keep holding down the power button. Wish it would just stay on until you click it again to turn off. Otherwise, it worked for what I needed. Engraving a lock for the wife. :) Comes with lots of extra size tips also. Any job it's covered!
customer_reviews.author: Heather P

customer_reviews.title: This product arrived defective
customer_reviews.text: Would give zero stars if I coukd. Product is defective and never worked. I thought it may have been the bvatteries so i bought new batteries and it still didn't work. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: This is the 2nd one I have bought and the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I have bought and the first one lasted about a year before it just stopped working and the second one I just purchased back in April and went to use it this morning and nothing the 2nd one had stopped working 😒😒
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: 2 tips not 7
customer_reviews.text: False advertising here. It says it has 7 engraving tips. It only comes with 2.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Segovia

customer_reviews.title: Good for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: Was very easy to use and etched very well when it wanted to work. After etching one image it started to die out I would fiddle with it and it would start back up only to die again. After finishing about 4 images it died completely. I loved that it was cordless, I hate being attached to an outlet, and I loved the tips but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m disappointed with the seller
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed with the seller. The description stating that it comes with extra tips with a total of 7 but it only comes with 2 that’s includes one In the engraver.
customer_reviews.author: Melai

customer_reviews.title: Great engraver
customer_reviews.text: The pen engraver is what I needed for engraving all my personal things. Thank you for a great product

customer_reviews.title: It was very to use just like writing with a ink pen

customer_reviews.title: Groomer approved
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! I'm a groomer and getting our tools mixed up happens all the time, so I got this to label my blades and tools, and it is so easy to use and works great! Would definitely buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Work Very Well
customer_reviews.text: It worked for about 5 seconds the first three times I tried to use it, after that it stopped working completely even with new batteries put in.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: this works great, easy to use and not big and clunky like the plug in electric engravers.

customer_reviews.title: ONLY WORKS FOR THE FIRST 5 TIMES
customer_reviews.text: Worked good in the beginning, but then after 5 or six times of use it stopped working! Thought maybe it was the batteries so I replaced them and still did not work. If you give the tip a push it will spin to engrave but once pressure is pushed for use, it stops.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: Broke/died after 8 minutes, never worked again.
customer_reviews.text: 0/10. Worked for about 8 minutes before dying and never working again. Gave it some time, switched batteries, tried everything and it didn't work again after the first 8 minutes.

customer_reviews.title: Works great These tips are amazing for fine detail
customer_reviews.text: Works great These tips are amazing for fine detail work

customer_reviews.title: It does not work!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money on this piece of Crap. I received mine today. It looks nice and appears to be well constructed. Looks are deceiving. It worked for approximately 5 minutes then nothing. I thought perhaps it is the batteries. I exchanged batteries from a working device, nothing. You would get more enjoyment from riding down the road and throwing $15 out the window than you will with this piece of crap.

customer_reviews.title: Barely enough power to even scratch metal no less engrave ...
customer_reviews.text: Barely enough power to even scratch metal no less engrave. It stalls out if you put any pressure on it at all. Sorry I purchased.

customer_reviews.title: Package came with everything missing
customer_reviews.text: Got the package in the mail the padded envelope was intact and looked like it had been handled well but the product package was missing the batteries and diamond tips. So I just returned it and got general pencil engraver instead.
customer_reviews.author: 5lick_12ick

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep whats yours  ....... yours.
customer_reviews.text: The DIY Engraver Pen is a great little engraving tool that you can put in your shirt pocket. Its a very handy tool to engrave your personal ID where it can't be seen so it can be proven its yours if stolen. This is a no brainer. For the price, its well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom  L.

customer_reviews.title: Handi for old guys
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, my other Dremel bits work as well, though it's not super powerful for some applications and won't totally substitute for the Dremel, it's great for light etching. Good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W. Bonfield

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my hand as it’s like writing with a pen.
customer_reviews.text: I engraved a metal can and was pleasantly surprised at the ease of using this product. I wrote in cursive and it was very smooth.

product_meta.title: DIY Engraver Pen Electric Engraving Tools For Jewellery Metal Glass with Replaceable Diamond Tip Bit
product_meta.description:
Let you engrave or decorate a wide variety of materials, and you will find it possible to create excellent personal gifts for the pursuit of hobbies, such as decorative wooden plates, metal, plastic, glass,leather,candles, and picture frames.

With this engraver, the only limit is your imagination. Engrave your wedding date on a glass tumbler for an anniversary gift or wedding favour, jazz up a plain wooden frame with a mix of lines and letters, or embellish a simple mirror with a lovely engraved design. Make full use of your imagination and engrave as you like!

Description:

Item type: Engraving pen

Material: Aluminum

Color: Blue

Powered by: 2 x AAA batteries(included)

How to Use:

1.Insert battery positive end facing up.

2.Press the control button in with your thumb, applying slight pressure, press tool down on surface to be engraved. Hold it at a slight angle (like you would a pencil)

3.To turn off simply release thumb pressure from control button.

4.To replace the tip grasp gently and pull out, firmly push new tip in.

Package include:

1 x Engraving pen

2 x AAA Batteries

6 x Diamond engraving tips

1 x Special tool for grinding head
feature_bullets: High Quality: Japanese electrical machinery has a 21,000 RPM Motor to engrave glass, metal, ceramic and plastic, only need two AAA batteries.

Wide Application: Engraves on a wide variety of materials, like metal, stone, plastic, glass, ceramic, wood, leather and more. Personalize and decorate collections, tools, phone cases, goblets, dog tags even valuables, and carved belongings for a unique touch.
Easy to Use: Hold the engrave like a pen with your thumb over the control button with a standard 3/32-inch engraving diamond tip bit and safe fingertip controlled on/off switch.
Engraving Diamond Tip Bit: Using a standard 3/32-inch engraving diamond tip bit and safe fingertip controlled on/off switch.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars80 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
